name: Christmas Cat Merge Evolution!
description:
Merge the Christmas cats to discover all the evolutions!

This is a short game made in a few days and takes 10 minutes or so to complete. You should also be able to leave it idling in a tab in the background if you wish.

Please note that as far as I know, web games on itch do not run in Chrome - use Firefox!

Instructions:

  • Tap the gift boxes to open them
  • Drag & drop an object/cat onto a matching one to merge it
  • The more your merge, the more coins your cats earn!
  • Spend your coins on upgrades
  • Discover all the evolutions to complete the game!
